sections.title: Subscription Terms
sections.content: By subscribing to Curio Box, you agree to receive monthly boxes and pay the subscription fee unless canceled before the renewal date.

sections.title: Cancellation & Refunds
sections.content: You may cancel anytime before your next billing cycle. Refunds are not provided for already shipped boxes.

sections.title: Shipping Policy
sections.content: Boxes are shipped within the first week of every month. Delays may occur due to unforeseen events.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content, logos, and designs are the intellectual property of Curio Box and cannot be used without permission.

sections.title: Modifications
sections.content: We reserve the right to update these terms at any time. Continued use of our service implies acceptance of the updated terms.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect personal information such as name, email address, shipping address, and payment details when you subscribe or place an order.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use your data to fulfill orders, improve our services, and send promotions or updates.

sections.title: Cookies and Tracking
sections.content: We use cookies to personalize user experience and analyze website traffic. Users may disable cookies through browser settings.

sections.title: Data Sharing
sections.content: Your data may be shared with third-party providers only to facilitate our services (e.g., shipping or payment processing).

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We take reasonable security steps to protect your data, including encryption and secure storage.

sections.title: Children's Privacy
sections.content: We do not knowingly collect information from children under 13 without parental consent.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You can request access to, correction, or deletion of your personal data anytime.

sections.title: Policy Updates
sections.content: We may revise this privacy policy and will notify users of significant changes via the website.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions regarding these policies, please email support@curiobox.com.
